official_title: A bill to provide that Federal Reserve notes shall be printed in a manner which enables an individual who is blind to determine the denomination of each such note.

summary.text: Requires that Federal Reserve notes in specified denominations be trimmed in a manner which makes them recognizable to an individual who is blind. Makes this Act applicable to notes which are printed after the date of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide that Federal Reserve notes shall be printed in a manner which enables an individual who is blind to determine the denomination of each such note.
